channel.title: As you all know, Ice Barrage is supposed to attack muliple enemies
channel.description: Well how do you make it attack more than one person?! Ive only seen once server where it actually attacked four people at once.

item.title: As you all know, Ice Barrage is supposed to attack muliple enemies
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

nice gwd ownage ftw pl0x?

item.source: As you all know, Ice Barrage is supposed to attack muliple enemies

item.title: As you all know, Ice Barrage is supposed to attack muliple enemies
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

FLCLover:

Yes, works 100%. Thank you very much.

Remorve the gfx and hitdiff + miscrandom from the spell and add it this: attackNPCSWithin(369, 45, 5);It’s for npcs - explained - The first number is the barrage gfx, second number is the spell’s max hit, in my server it’s 45 and the last is how far it hits, like it has 5 so it hits enemies maximium 5 squares away from the player and here’s the player code: attackPlayersWithin(369, 45, 5); The code is same, it just hits players instead of npc’s.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2008, 05:56:04 am[/size][hr]If you did right, THE RESULTS:

Lol, my bandos godwars
[/quote]
Time to make my uber admin ice barrage! Actually, I gotta remake my server since my hard drive fried![/quote]Np

Read full topic

Lol, my bandos godwars :D[/quote]
Time to make my uber admin ice barrage! Actually, I gotta remake my server since my hard drive fried!

item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

[quote=“451465, post:6, topic:224567”]umm sorry im kind of a noob at coding but what is a non dodian,devolution kind of server. i mean i have host ultimate pk and im using client silabsoft (downloaded one). and is this fairly easy to do its just im having alot of problems getting it running but when it ends up running i want it to be a good server.

thanks,
451465[/quote] Silab server usually are non-dodian/devolution, it should work for u, just don’t mess up with spaces and { }'s

Read full topic

This will be my first server but im trying to see what i can do to make it better anyways i just want to know if you used this and if it worked thanks

please respnod soon,

It works for me like the pic shows it.
